import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Spinner } from "react-bootstrap" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { fetchUsers, appendToContacts } from '../redux/contacts/actions' const Contacts = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { users, error, loading } = useSelector(state => state.contacts) useEffect(() => { if (!users.length) dispatch(fetchUsers()) }, []) return <>
